full_summary:
### Queen’s Gates Rehabilitation
#### Tender ID: WS4338211963-Doc4339502163
#### Amendment No: 1
#### Solicitation No: WS4338211963
#### Published Date: 2023-12-05
#### Closing Date: 2024-01-17T14:00:00

The Government of Canada invites Qualified Bidders to submit their proposals for the Queen’s Gates Rehabilitation project.

### Project Overview
The scope of work for the Queen’s and pedestrian gates rehabilitation involves the disassembly of each gate into its individual components, stripping of paint and rust, correction and reinstallation of iron elements and ornamental detailing as needed. Improvements such as the use of new materials to ensure longevity to heavily used components shall be implemented.

### Tender Details

- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **UNSPC Titles:** Iron forgings, Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services, Nonresidential building construction services, Restoration architectural service

### Contractual Information

- **Contract Duration:** 2024-01-31 to 2026-01-31
- **Procurement Category:** Construction Services
- **Procurement Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The proposals will be evaluated based on price, with the lowest price proposal being selected.

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Officer:** Robert Angell (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18194227?extsite=MTgxOTQyMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18194227?extsite=MTgxOTQyMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The tender document for this project is available on the Government of Canada’s Procurement Information Portal. Bidders are required to review the tender document thoroughly before submitting their proposal. The deadline for submitting proposals is 2024-01-17T14:00:00. Late proposals will not be accepted. All inquiries should be directed to the contracting officer. The Government of Canada reserves the right to cancel this tender
